original_text: Therefore hear the counsel of the Lord, that he hath taken against Edom; and his purposes, that he hath purposed against the inhabitants of Teman: Surely the least of the flock shall draw them out: surely he shall make their habitations desolate with them.
korean_text: 그런즉 에돔에 대한 여호와의 의도와 데만 주민에 대하여 결심하신 여호와의 계획을 들으라 양 떼의 어린 것들을 그들이 반드시 끌고 다니며 괴롭히고 그 처소로 황폐하게 하지 않으랴

sentences.original_text: Therefore hear the counsel of the Lord
that he hath taken against Edom
that he hath purposed against the inhabitants of Teman
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 데만 주민들을 대적하여 계획하신 것들을

sentences.original_text: Surely the least of the flock shall draw them out
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 양 떼中最小者가 그들을 이끌어낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: surely he shall make their habitations desolate with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들의 거처를 그들과 함께 황폐하게 만들 것이다
